ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class DifferentialLineDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.DifferentialLineDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineDetectorController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PDifferentialLineDetector

    public class DifferentialLineDetector
extends java.lang.Object
implements LineDetectorController
    Differential line detector that uses difference between old value and current value implements the line detector controller class
    Author:
    Victor, Matthew
